thread.title: Telegraph Travel Awards 2015/16: win a £16,000 gourmet break in France
thread.title_full: Telegraph Travel Awards 2015/16: win a £16,000 gourmet break in France - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Telegraph Travel Awards 2015/16: win a £16,000 gourmet break in France
text: The prize Two people get the chance to stay in three unique properties: Les Prés d’Eugénie, La Bastide and Château de Riell, the beautiful homes of the Guerard family. A 13-night gourmet experience will give the winners a chance to experience the finest of French cuisine, courtesy of three-Michelin Star chef Michel Guerard, plus first-class luxury spa treatments (flights not included). michelguerard.com How to enter Follow this link to tell us about your favourite travel companies and destinations - and to enter the draw for one of 27 prizes . You will need to leave your name, telephone number and a valid email address. See here for full terms and conditions . Telegraphtravel
